entry.title: Why public chats are better than direct messages
entry.quote: If Alice has a question for Bob, she is likely to ask Bob directly rather than posting a question in a group team chat. At ivelum, we do the opposite.

entry.title: Why Does This Horrifying Woman Keep Appearing in AI-Generated Images?
entry.quote: “Loab” is creepypasta for the AI generation, and nobody understands where she came from.

entry.title: Doomscrolling linked to poor physical and mental health, study finds
entry.quote: The tendency to be glued to bad news can spark a ‘vicious cycle’ that interferes with our lives, researcher says

entry.title: Some Things I Realized about AI while Contemplating Slide Rule Prices on Ebay
entry.quote: Engineers in many industries are focused on the details and reliant on the simulations to put all the pieces together to make a coherent whole. The problem with simulating everything to death is that it actually helps keep us ignorant of basic principles.

entry.title: The first Bible completely illustrated by an Artificial Intelligence (AI)
entry.quote: Each of the 31,000+ verses of the Bible is accompanied by a unique illustration created by the AI model Stable Diffusion
